longBusinessSummary: Harvia Oyj manufactures and distributes traditional, steam, and infrared saunas. It provides electric and wood burning heaters, as well as combi heaters with steam; bathroom and indoor saunas; backyard paradise and sauna interior solutions; doors and glass products; hot tubs; control units; infrared cabins, controls, and heating devices; steam rooms, SPA modules, and steam generators; and water purifying solutions. The company also offers accessories, such as pails and ladles, scents, textiles, indicators, sound and lighting products, stones, maintenance products, neck and back rests, and other accessories, as well as safety solutions; and sauna installation, maintenance, and repair services. It operates in Finland, North America, Germany, Scandinavia, rest of European countries, and internationally. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Muurame, Finland.
